Welcome to Mafia Mystery 2.0! We've been working hard to bring you some great updates, so here's what to expect:

- Town themes!
- Winter & Wild West
- Snowman and Indian avatars
- Only comes with a town theme purchase
- All new chat messaging platform
- Relies on sockets instead of push notifications. This means it will be instant and still functions if users turn off push notifications.
- Messages are viewable while typing
- Initial messages are loaded once when a game is opened instead of each time the chat window opens. This is much faster and requires less data transfer.
- Town Hall and Courthouse notification sound alerts only for first message until opened.
- All voting uses this new message platform as well.
- Team colors show in courthouse
- Added role names throughout the app
- Redesigned Create Game screen
- Removed video watching for coins from main menu (in store now)
- Chat and voting windows are automatically closed when showing a game over or death notification
- Increased font for in-game Time, Day, and Menu

Recent Server-side Changes:
- Bug where doctor sometimes wouldn't save has been fixed
- Stricter limits on public games
- Decreased maximum ratio of Sheriffs allowed
- Increased minimum number of Mafia members to 2

- Public game list loads faster and is updated in real time
- Faster loading for day/night changes
- Improved optimization

- Cigar Shop: This is a new system we're implementing to help prevent AFK players. Cigars are needed to join and create games, and will replenish over time. This will limit the rate at which players can join games, which we believe will keep everyone more active.
- Bug Fixes:
- iPad users couldn't create games with a town theme
- Pre-game chat not updating
- Couldn't open Town Hall after game ended
- Chat message width adjusts to device size

- Player's get a free cigar if no video is available
- Fixed white lines on iPad chat

- New feature: tap a chat message to reply with @username
- Add friend button added to user profile
- Godfather fixed (unlimited cigars)
- Larger in-game menus
- Enabled 'Menu' button to exit game during a refresh
- Fixed display for number of remaining role choices
- Minor bug fixes

- Performance improvements
- Reduced stored device data
- Pregame chat shows username if user leaves game

The Gravedigger can talk to dead members at night. May choose one person to revive, but will die in their place. Sided with the village.
